juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required concrete visual elements for the final image:

*   L-shaped desk (as depicted in Figure 1)
*   Orange office chair (as depicted in Figure 1)
*   White printer (as depicted in Figure 1, on the desk)
*   Open laptop (as depicted in Figure 1, on the desk)
*   Wall-mounted shelves with books and decorative items (as depicted in Figure 1)
*   Framed artwork on the wall (as depicted in Figure 1, beneath the shelves)
*   Bed with pillows and bedding (as depicted in Figure 1)
*   Large window with outdoor view (as depicted in Figure 1)
*   Green curtains (as depicted in Figure 1)
*   Light-colored wardrobe cabinets (as depicted in Figure 1)
*   Desk lamp with dark base and fabric shade (from Figure 2)
*   Man in grey blazer, black t-shirt, black pants, and white sneakers (from Figure 3)
